website_summaries.verdict: With ample space, numerous jets, and a comfortable design, this model earns our top marks for its features and functions.
pros: Comfortable seating that includes a lounger and space for up to 5 people
30 jets make it ideal for relaxing tired muscles
We love that it comes with a built-in ice bucket
Also offers sturdy construction and comes with a cover
cons: Heating the water to a preferred temperature takes a little time

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HOT TUB!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hot tub for the value. Comparable to hot tubs that cost twice as much. When hooked up to 220v it heats up within 3-4 hours. Very comfortable seating. The filtering system works very well. I have had my hot tub set up now for about two months and the water is crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Best thing my Wife ever talked me into...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect size for what we needed it for. It fit perfectly 74 x 74 on the platform I made. The unit ran good as plug and play but once hardwired ran so much better. A few hiccups, but they were addressed in a very timely fashion... so if your looking for a spa without all the nonsense this is your best bet... We love it, and Strong Spa has great customer service too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Libertella

customer_reviews.title: it is very easy to go through a 36" gate opening
customer_reviews.text: This hot tub is manufactured by Strong Spas in Northumberland, PA. With some help we strapped it to 2 furniture dollies and moved it to the backyard. The hot tub is 34" high and with it on its side, it is very easy to go through a 36" gate opening. Setup is easy if you follow the instructions. I am using the 15 amp GFCI Cord and will change it to the 40 Amp 240 Volts Service before Winter. I called Strong Spas several times before my purchase to verify dimensions, features, and warranty information. Their customer service is awesome. I am very pleased with the quality and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Secrest

customer_reviews.title: Getting the service cover off is tricky, but I figured it out.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new spa. It keeps the heat...only loses 1-2 degrees over 45 minutes to an hour. It only goes up to 104.... which I thought wasn't going to be hot enough, but after it cycles off after about 15-20 minutes... I'm cooked! The jets are not as powerful as the kinds that need 220 electrical....but it's perfect for me. I feel so relaxed and massaged after 20 minutes. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Sherbear

customer_reviews.title: Good tub for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice tub for the money. Set up is relatively easy, but draining the tub requires removing the entire rear panel if you want to access the drain plug, and it is not terribly easy to get the panels back in place properly.
customer_reviews.author: D.P. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: My Essential Hot Tub "Adelaide"
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Hot Tub for about a year now and have enjoyed it ! When I bought this it was wired "plug and Play". This worked but not efficiently, I had it rewired 220 Volt and it work much better, 110 volt shared the juice between the pump and heater, the heater could barely keep up. Now it heats fast and the temp. never drops. I would recommend this hot tub to any one, the price was also about half the price of a comparable model at the local spa store.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Wiliams

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK ON ARRIVAL
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered dead on arrival. Does not work. Hassle to put in since it's so heavy and they just drop it at your house. And then when we got it in and plugged in, it didn't work! The pump doesn't turn on. The directions are one of those one-size-fits-all models and the diagrams and instructions don't match with what was delivered. Also, customer service only available M-F 8:30-6pm so no help this weekend. I'll have to hire my own tech to come out and figure out what's wrong. Such a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tub, great quality for price, great product! Upgraded to 220 since I live in Wisconsin... 110 just wont do it since I do want to use it in the winter months. I’d recommend to anyone just upgrade to 220... it’ll save you in the long run. Delivered in great condition and driver used a for lift from abf and put it where we wanted it. No complaints at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R Larrabee

customer_reviews.title: This company don’t want to warranty their product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased and installed it used it for 3 months and liked it. Until We started having trouble with the heater bring the tub up to temperature we normally set it on 97 Degrees and it would only get to about 90 so we called and were told that we had voided their warranty because I had it delivered to my warehouse where I have forklifts, people and a docks!! Customer service claimed that this was clearly stated on Amazon site?? I have looked several times and see nothing about that!! The tub was unloaded and kept in a controlled environment For a week until I could get everyone scheduled to hook it up at my home!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Poff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hot tub !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hot tub for a great price!! Installation was very easy, pretty much a plug and play! Every hour the tub generally increases temperature 2 degrees, took about 24 hours for our tub to heat up for first time use. Tub holds heat well and chemicals are not too hard. The jets are very relaxing and have a nice two speed mode. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: OSU

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hot tub
customer_reviews.text: Was a tad skeptical at first mainly due to the low price when compared to the "spa stores" Shipping took a long time however understandable due to the size and weight of this awesome tub. (800lbs) If you decide to purchase this tub be aware that the shipping company will deliver it curbside. (my delivery was a single older man that dropped it at my driveway from at full size tractor trailer) Read the instructions, they are shipped winterized so you need to drain and clean it before filling completely.
customer_reviews.author: Edward D.

customer_reviews.title: Great hot tub for a small space with 34 jets that are powerful
customer_reviews.text: My family of 4 has had this hot tub for a year. It was delivered via forklift and slid into our side yard with no problem. It fits all of us and the lounger chair is the best and my favorite spot. The jets are great and adjustable and you can turn them off to give more power to the other jets. BEst to fill up with hot water b/c it takes the heater a while to heat up cold water . Settings are easy to use and just follow maintenance schedule in instructions with regard to testing and maintaining water quality.
customer_reviews.author: Terry K.

customer_reviews.title: Great hot tub...for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as Plug & Play -- but this is not "Plug & Play". Due to code requirements, working with outside outlets needs a modification - so GFI cords are not plugged into GFI outlets. Also, the panels are not easy to remove and re-install; but with a little patience and strength, the panels can be reinstalled. The is sue we currently have is that one of the jets in the leg area of the recliner position does not work properly. Despite adjusting the water flow pressure, and turning the jet on & off, the water does not flow through the jet. Overall, for the price and the performance we have seen so far, we would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our family!
customer_reviews.text: Loving the new hot tub. Fit perfectly in our space, delivery was easy and on time. It took 4 guys with appliance straps about 15 min to move to our location in the backyard. Works perfectly on 110v although we will be converting it to 220v at a later date. Took about 24hours to heat up to temp. Jets are perfect. Fits 3-4 comfortably. Love the built in cooler, nice touch. Overall, extremely satisfied as a first time hot tub owner.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Essler

customer_reviews.title: Great plug and play hot tub!
customer_reviews.text: This hot tub has been amazing. We purchased it in late summer. It hasn’t had any trouble staying hot all winter. We live in the Midwest so it has had to operate in all weather conditions. It’s pretty straightforward to operate. Fill it, plug it in and it’s ready to go. Getting the access panel off could be improved on. When they come out with a new model hopefully they fix that issue. Shouldn’t need a screwdriver or drill to get to the access panel. And it shouldn’t be placed at the back where it’s mostly likely going to be near a wall. Leaving very little room to work.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Vilbert

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This hot tub came and within a month the level 2 - basically the hot tub jet functionality was not working. If you get through to customer support they tell you they will send a tech out ...you are screwed. I spent a lot of money for a warm bath. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Russ Abram

customer_reviews.title: Great hot tub for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This hot tub fits our deck perfectly! It was at 102 degrees in less than 24 hours and it is very relaxing to sit in. Only issue was getting to the components (via the access panel). It was extremely difficult to get it off and back on and the instructions are poorly written. Other than that, I highly recommended this hot tub! We were planning to convert to 220v but so far, we don’t feel the need as it is working fine!!
customer_reviews.author: Jarod Shamp

customer_reviews.title: Great Hot Tub for the money..
customer_reviews.text: Great Hot Tub for your money, with out spending a fortune. We had a problem with the cooler lid turning into a shelve, it would not stay on as a shelve. After one call and a email sent to customer service with pictures and explaining the problem. They sent us a new shelve right away. Was a little difficult to put in place with only two people. But once it was in place it was easy to set up and operate. As other reviews have said it is a pain to get the service panel off and back on. They could improve that. But all and all it seems to be a great hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rigney

customer_reviews.title: RELAXING  PURFECT
customer_reviews.text: I haver had other hot tubs but this is undoubtedly the best, Great price ease to install. It comes with a cover which is very important and stairs. I would recommend it to everyone , Delivery was also very easy and on time.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN  BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: The hot tub came packaged perfectly. Easy to move around to the spot we wanted. Really so easy, just "plug and play". Really only comfortable for 2 adults, could fit 3 but would be a bit awkward. Ours had an issue with the small electrical control, we couldn't adjust the temp. We called and they sent someone right out to replace. Everything works perfectly, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Bigger and better than expected. Great value. Terrific support.
customer_reviews.text: The quality and size of the hot tub surprised me. I expected it to be smaller in size and of a lower quality since the price was so good. Even the electrician that helped with the installation commented that it seems like a very well-built and luxurious hot tub. Additionally, the technical support people were very helpful when I called in. Overall, excellent US-made hot tub with excellent support. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great tub for a good price
customer_reviews.text: The tub is very nice. plug and use right away is great. the service side is very hard to open and nothing like the manual refers to. I don't think I'll open it anymore. to drain I will just siphon. other than the access to the service compartment everything is great!
customer_reviews.author: eric b knight

customer_reviews.title: Great tub, Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more pleased with this purchase! Actually took longer to fill it with water, than it did to uncrate it and set it up! Works perfectly. Have used it almost every day since arrival!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Potter

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for over a month now! It is super fun and adds relaxation to your own home. Strongly recommend if you’re in the market for a jacuzzi!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: connections on factory parts no to par.
customer_reviews.text: The in side black plastic filter 2 of them. In side the access panel to try to tighten the nuts that hold them tight were leaking bad. Can't get in there to tighten them up. Any suggestions, Please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Nice spa for the price
customer_reviews.text: Once I realized there was a quick set up guide I had already followed the instructions to remove the side panel according to the use manual and found the instructions didn't match. Would have preferred a guide specific to my model.
customer_reviews.author: BLG - Maryland

customer_reviews.title: I'm lovin' it!!
customer_reviews.text: We finally got our hot tub up and going. We are very pleased considering what we paid for it! I would recommend this product to anyone who wants a quality hot tub without spending a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this hot tub. Easy to install and use. We were looking for a smaller model and this one is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hot tub, and fantastic service from the manufacturer!
customer_reviews.text: Got the hot tub and can say that its easily worth twice as much if you go to local stores. Event at 110v setting, hot and bubbly! Had a small issue with a small part and the company responded fantastically - which is what you want when you buy your tub remotely. Cant be happier.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Essential Hot Tub
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up once you get it in location. The only gripe is accessing the maintenance panel is a pain. Comfortable and attractive. Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great hot tub
customer_reviews.text: Just received my hot tub a few days ago and setup was easy. Delivered on time. I was a littler nervous about the chemistry, but patience goes a long way. For a 110v, it heated up quicker than anticipated. I am in CA, so temperature doesn’t get too low, so we will see if an upgrade is needed in the future, but these few past days have been great. Very satisfied and great hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Was weeks late arriving and can’t get serviced to get the jets to work.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great tub .
customer_reviews.text: Only negative point is the service panel very hart to access but great tub
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Love my new hot tub life!
customer_reviews.text: Way overdue. This tub is small enough to fit through most doors. I did have to remove some of the package material on the top of the top to get it through the door but I love it inside. I would recommend taking the screws out for the access panel ahead of time if they are in a hard to reach area.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Dresser

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Hot Tub!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hot tub! Perfect size! Set up is easy to follow with the manual:) This is our first hot tub purchase so I refer to the manual quite often. Been an experience to get chemicals right but that would go for any hot tub. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great hot tub
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hot tub. Easy to install hooked it to 220 it heats up fast. The Jets are very nice. Seating is comfortable. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tucalota

customer_reviews.title: good quality hot tub
customer_reviews.text: The delivery of the hot tub by ABF trucking was exceptional. The driver helped place the tub exactly where I wanted it. The setup of the tub was easy the owners manual easy to follow. The tub is well made and so far everything is what I expected
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey aikens

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: I’m suppose to write a review to get two free filters
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great hot tub!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up. So far the plug and play has been great, but we will convert to 220 when it starts to get colder. To get the panels off and on can be a bit tricky. However, with assistance it’s easy.
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice hot tub
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my hot tub very much. The size is perfect because I have a small yard. It was a good price and has nice features like the lighted fountain. Runs quiet and it’s very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jack M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: From start to finish this was a painless process to get a great product that works well and looks great. If you want simple plug and play operation the this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Rubidge

customer_reviews.title: budget hot tub,
customer_reviews.text: great product for the money, keep in mind this is a budget hot tub. took 5 weeks to get here. its small enough to fit through a double front door. thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great spa for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I love this spa. It provides just enough jet pressure to work the knots out your joints and only cost about 20 a month to operate
customer_reviews.author: William fredd

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product especially for the money. It was easy to install, easy to hook up, and works great. Great produst for the money.
customer_reviews.author: monica creteau

customer_reviews.title: Great hot tub for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Professionally shipped, easy to set up and operate. This is the fourth hot tub I have owned and I would easily purchase this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Mitchell

product_meta.title: Essential Hot Tubs 30-Jet Adelaide Hot Tub, Seats 5-6, Gray
product_meta.description: Step into the Essential Hot Tubs Adelaide and step into your own personal oasis. Our Adelaide model features 30 stainless steel, fully adjustable jets distributed among the ergonomic seating for up to six. Powered by an energy efficient two-speed, 2 Peak HP pump, the Adelaide delivers the power to melt away stress and leave your muscles feeling soothed and refreshed. Whether your place is in the Lounger or one of two Captain’s Chairs, you can customize your experience in the Adelaide from a soothing soak to a full hydrotherapy massage. The choice is at your fingertips in the state of the art command center with digital, backlit display. With the addition of fabulous amenities like 3 headrests, 2 LED lit water columns and a convenient built-in ice bucket with a lid and tray, the Adelaide has everything. Plug into any standard 120V/15A household outlet and you’re ready to entertain. You also have the option to convert to a 240V electrical unit allowing your heater to perform at its maximum on the coldest days, which we recommend having professionally installed by an electrician. The finishing touch to the Adelaide by Essential Hot Tubs is its custom designed cabinet that houses an all-season, stainless steel Balboa heater, and the heavy-duty insulated cover that comes standard. You’ll be ready to slip into relaxation and comfort anytime, all year long. This product is delivered using a curbside delivery service.
feature_bullets: 30 STAINLESS STEEL ADJUSTABLE JETS: Relax with passive therapy or switch to an invigorating massage at the touch of a button.

SEATS 5-6: Ergonomic seating for 5-6 with Lounger and 2 Captain’s Chairs. There’s plenty of space to choose. Get a whole body massage in the Lounger or choose the Captain’s Chair for an invigorating massage.
PLUG & PLAY: Relax in minutes by plugging into any standard 120V/15A outlet, GFCI cord included.
ALL-SEASON: 1kW/4kW(120V/240V) true all-season stainless steel Balboa heater for year-round enjoyment. Heavy-duty, insulated tapered cover with locking clips included.
MADE IN THE USA: You can take pride in knowing that your Essential Hot Tub is made right here in the USA.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars92 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
